posts.title: Speckled Pony with rhinestones for eyes
posts.text: I don't want to give him up, but my mommy says I can't take it to college with me

posts.title: 1/2 Bedroom, 1 Bath
posts.text: Beautiful home for a single person. Must have an interest in clowns. If you don't like over the top, don't bother contacting

posts.title: Strong sturdy man needed with a certain expertise
posts.text: I hava a clog that just won't come unclogged. Bring your own...plunger and a hardy appetite. Send me a picture, so I know who to expect at the door.
